subject: Pedal problem
description_text:
Hello,
today i received from Amazon the Pro plus X Pedals.
I installed und calibrate it.
After the First start the simsonn Software Show the Pedals as not connectet.
I use the latest Software.
Win11 Show a Driver fault ?

Please Help me. I dont know whats happend.

Sorry for my Bad english.

Michael

conversations.body_text: Hi Hansdampfer,    Launch the latest version of SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2.     On the “Plus X” control unit, press and hold the “Upgrade” button.     While holding the button, unplug the USB cable from the PC and then plug it back in. The software should detect the device entering “SIMSONN Flasher update mode”.     In the software go to: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update.     In the file selector choose: pedals‑firmware → pedals‑plusx.sfu.     Click “Start Update” and wait until the firmware is completely written. During this process do not disconnect the USB or close the application.     Once the update is finished (you’ll get a success prompt or the unit will reboot), unplug and re‑plug the USB then test the pedal device to confirm everything works correctly.
